Name: Status Bar Example
Description: This adds a 'example-status-bar' alias that will demonstrate how to set the status bar text from Lua.
Author: Rhien

AliasList.Command:
-- This example will demonstrate how to access the status bar from Lua.
lua.Send("#example")
lua.Echo("    This example will count to 10 in the blue status bar in the lower")
lua.Echo("    left hand side of the mud client.  The example will begin in 2 ")
lua.Echo("    seconds.")

lua.Sleep(2000)

for i = 1, 10 do
    lua.SetText(i)
    lua.Sleep(1000)
end

lua.SetText("I have completed counting to 10.", "CheckboxMarkedCircle")
